name: Name:
favoriteFoodValue: Anything I get from my owner
welcome: My name is Zénó, a friendly and playful spaniel mix from Budapest. I spend most of my days playing, sleeping, and looking for tasty treats.
title: Write to Zénó!
emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address.
messageRequired: Please write something in the message field.
privacyContent: This site does not process any personal data of visitors. The data provided in the contact form is used solely for receiving your message and is not shared with third parties.
copyrightContent: All text and image content on this site, including photos, graphics, logos, and other materials, are the exclusive property of the website owner and are protected by copyright law. Copying, distributing, modifying, or using the content in any form without the prior written permission of the owner is prohibited.
cookiesContent: This site does not use any tracking or marketing cookies. Only the language setting selected by the user is stored in the browser via localStorage. This data contains no personal information and is not shared with third parties. The language setting can be deleted at any time in the browser settings.

places.arboretumDesc: A huge walk close to nature.
